entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains late this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
